short_summary: Procurement of fifteen Multi Role Boat Trailers
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure quantity fifteen (15) Multi Role Boat (MRB) Trailers for delivery to Halifax and Esquimalt in Canada.  The requested delivery date is as soon as possible.
full_summary:
# Policy Brief - Government Tender Announcement: Trailers for Multi Role Boats

**Title (English)**: Trailer, Multi Role Boat

**Title (French)**: Remorque pour Bateau Multi Rôle

**Reference Number**: cb-6285-95639034

**Current Status**: Expired

**Canada Gazette**: **Solicitation Number**: W8472-235874/A

## Tender Details
**Notice Type (English)**: Request for Proposal
**Notice Type (French)**: Demande de Propriété

**Procurement Method (English)**: Competitive - Open bidding
**Procurement Method (French)**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

**Bidder Selection Criteria (English)**: Lowest Price
**Bidder Selection Criteria (French)**: Prix le moins bas

## Government Matters
The **Department of National Defence (DND)** invites bidders to submit their tender for quantity fifteen (15) Multi Role Boat (MRB) trailers. Bidders shall adhere to the following key conditions:

* Preference for bid offering Canadian goods.
* Conditiional limited basis to bids offering Canadian goods.

## Regional Matters
The government requires that the delivery of Multi Role Boat (MRB) Trailers be made to Halifax and Esquimalt, Canada. The requested delivery date is as soon as possible.

## Trade Agreements
This tender adheres to the following trade agreements:

* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Accords de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

## Contact Details
**Tender Contact**: Nadine Baril,[nadine.baril@forces.gc.ca](mailto:nadine.baril@forces.gc.ca), (613) 862-7297

## Document Link
Tender documents are available in both English and French at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)

## Appendices
Download the tender documents by clicking the links:

* [English Document 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6285/rfp-amend-1-english-combine.pdf)
* [English Document 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6285/rfp-english.pdf)
* [English Document 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6285/r
